metadata.title: CVE-2022-32532 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.9.1, A RegexRequestMatcher can be misconfigured to bebypassed on some servlet containers. Applications using RegExPatternMatcherwith `.` in the regular expression are possibly vulnerable to anauthorization bypass.

criterions.comment: shiro package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
